info.name: RocketChat 0.59+ Compact+
info.description: Ultra compact sidebar and status to text colour.
info.additionalInfo: Plays well with style 133150. Changelog 2018-01-05 - v60 adjustment: no "room avatars"; no "edited by" avatar 2017-11-13 - better default font (Win), more compact messages in compact mode, visible reaction authors, image-less emojis (relies on your local fonts) with text transcriptions, fixed numbered reactions sorting ("polls"), tool tips to "status bar", polishing and performance improvements. More frequent updates are at https://gist.github.com/myfonj/3795d9ff5074f643e49ebfaab23f2e4b/ now . 2017-10-26 - more compactness (input field, room header), redundant infos hidden (sidebar headers, consecutive names), status colour in room title and info, better sidebar formatting 2017-10-24 - rectangular avatars with cropped and zoomed images, message actions repositioned. 2017-10-23 - init. Just (ultra) compact sidebar and status-to-font-color.
